params.name: oTheme
params.description: ApiTheme object.

CreateLayout.name: CreateLayout
CreateLayout.description: Create a new slide layout and adds it to the slide master if it specified.

params.name: oMaster
params.description: parent slide master.

params.name: sType
params.description: the placeholder type.

params.name: sName
params.description: specified theme's name.

params.name: oMaster
params.description: slide master. Required parameter.

params.name: oClrScheme
params.description: color scheme. Required parameter.

params.name: oFormatScheme
params.description: format scheme. Required parameter.

params.name: oFontScheme
params.description: font scheme. Required parameter.

params.name: sName
params.description: specified name of theme's color scheme.

params.name: arrColors
params.description: This array defines a set of colors which are referred to as a color scheme. The color scheme is responsible for defining a list of twelve colors. The array should contain a sequence of colors: 2 dark, 2 light,6 primary and a color for each of a hyperlink and followed hyperlink.

params.name: arrFill
params.description: This array contains fill styles. Should be composed of subtle, moderate and intense fills.

params.name: arrBgFill
params.description: This array contains the background fill styles. Should be composed of subtle, moderate and intense fills.

params.name: arrLine
params.description: This array contains line styles. Should be composed of subtle, moderate and intense lines.

params.name: mjLatin
params.description: Font's name. Is used to determine the major theme font applied to latit text.

params.name: mjEa
params.description: Font's name. Is used to determine the major theme font applied to east asian text.

params.name: mjCs
params.description: Font's name. Is used to determine the major theme font applied to complex script text.

params.name: mnLatin
params.description: Font's name. Is used to determine the minor theme font applied to latit text.

params.name: mnEa
params.description: Font's name. Is used to determine the minor theme font applied to east asian text.

params.name: mnCs
params.description: Font's name. Is used to determine the minor theme font applied to complex script text.

params.name: sName
params.description: name of this font scheme.

CreateImage.name: CreateImage
CreateImage.description: Create an image with the parameters specified.

params.name: sImageSrc
params.description: The image source where the image to be inserted should be taken from (currently only internet URL or Base64 encoded images are supported).

params.name: nWidth
params.description: The image width in English measure units.

params.name: nHeight
params.description: The image height in English measure units.

CreateShape.name: CreateShape
CreateShape.description: Create a shape with the parameters specified.

params.name: sType
params.description: The shape type which specifies the preset shape geometry.

params.name: nWidth
params.description: The shape width in English measure units.

params.name: nHeight
params.description: The shape height in English measure units.

params.name: oFill
params.description: The color or pattern used to fill the shape.

params.name: oStroke
params.description: The stroke used to create the element shadow.

CreateChart.name: CreateChart
CreateChart.description: Create a chart with the parameters specified.

params.name: sType
params.description: The chart type used for the chart display.

params.name: aSeries
params.description: The array of the data used to build the chart from.

params.name: aSeriesNames
params.description: The array of the names (the source table column names) used for the data which the chart will be build from.

params.name: aCatNames
params.description: The array of the names (the source table row names) used for the data which the chart will be build from.

params.name: nWidth
params.description: The chart width in English measure units.

params.name: nHeight
params.description: The chart height in English measure units.

params.name: nStyleIndex
params.description: The chart color style index (can be 1 - 48, as described in OOXML specification).

params.name: aDrawings
params.description: The array of drawings.

params.name: mjLatin
params.description: Font's name. Is used to determine the major theme font applied to latit text.

params.name: mjEa
params.description: Font's name. Is used to determine the major theme font applied to east asian text.

params.name: mjCs
params.description: Font's name. Is used to determine the major theme font applied to complex script text.

params.name: mnLatin
params.description: Font's name. Is used to determine the minor theme font applied to latit text.

params.name: mnEa
params.description: Font's name. Is used to determine the minor theme font applied to east asian text.

params.name: mnCs
params.description: Font's name. Is used to determine the minor theme font applied to complex script text.
